name: Dusk with a friend and a ball
name_original: Dusk with a friend and a ball
description:
It's dusk, and you are going outside to play with your friend.
Play some football together, stroll in the surroundings and watch the sunset.

Have a lovely play!

===

Move with ZQSD or WASD (use the Unity starting screen to change to your preferred settings) & look around with your favourite mouse.
Use Left and Right Clicks to make some things happen.

===

If you want to follow my future things, you can follow me on Twitter : @HeskHwis
The music is "brass practice" by Lullatone
